name: nodelint
description: the nodelint command line tool allows you to check for problems using jslint. you can specify your own --config file to use alternate jslint options and your own --reporter file if you want to customise the generated output.
kwds: the nodelint command line tool allows you to check for problems using jslint. you can specify your own --config file to use alternate jslint options and your own --reporter file if you want to customise the generated output. lint jslint nodelint code quality
